channel.title: Item requirements
channel.description: Currently a few items in my server require a specific amount of kills to wield. Could anyone tell me how to remove this requirement so I can make the items available to all players? Thanks.

item.title: Item requirements
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Currently a few items in my server require a specific amount of kills to wield.
Could anyone tell me how to remove this requirement so I can make the items available to all players?
Thanks.
